article_title: Super-PAC's Kasich ad hits back at Trump attack
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Even as Gov. John Kasich vowed Sunday on ABC’s "This Week" to not “take the low road to the highest office in the land,” an independent organization backing his candidacy unleashed a TV commercial accusing New York billionaire Donald Trump of lying.
